WHY_ME.TITLE: Why me
WHY_ME.TEXT: A short introduction of your skills. Highlight your experience of working on different projects using different front-end technologies and emphasise your openness to learning and adapting to new technologies.
WHY_ME.SUBTITLE: I am

SKILLS.TITLE: My Skill Set
SKILLS.TEXT: A short introduction of your skills. Highlight your experience of working on different projects using different front-end technologies and emphasise your openness to learning and adapting to new technologies.
SKILLS.SUBTEXT: Show that you are motivated to improve your skills, implement innovative solutions and stay abreast of new technologies.

PROJECTS.TITLE: My Work
PROJECTS.JOIN_DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
PROJECTS.JOIN_LEARNING: Through this project, I learned how to build a complex application with drag-and-drop functionality and state management.
PROJECTS.POLLO_DESCRIPTION: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
PROJECTS.POLLO_LEARNING: Through this project, I learned how to implement object-oriented programming in JavaScript and create a game loop.
PROJECTS.BUBBLE_DESCRIPTION: A Slack-like chat application that allows users to communicate in real-time. Features include channels, direct messages, and threads.
PROJECTS.BUBBLE_LEARNING: Through this project, I learned how to use Firebase for real-time data synchronization and authentication.

REFERENCES.TITLE: References
REFERENCES.REF_1_DESCRIPTION: "Paul is a very attentive and talented developer. He can plan and document task distribution well."

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact me
CONTACT.HEADING: Let us work together.
CONTACT.TEXT: Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in. Express confidence in your ability to make a meaningful contribution to a team through your expertise and enthusiasm for improving your skills.
CONTACT.PRIVACY_TEXT_2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

IMPRINT.TITLE: Legal Notice
IMPRINT.DISCLAIMER_TEXT: The contents of this page were created with the greatest care. However, no guarantee can be given for the accuracy, completeness and timeliness of the content. As a service provider, I am responsible for my own content on these pages in accordance with § 7 para.1 TMG under general law.
IMPRINT.COPYRIGHT_TEXT: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, processing, distribution and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright require the written consent of the respective author or creator.

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.INTRO_TEXT: The protection of your personal data is of particular concern to me. I therefore process your data exclusively on the basis of legal regulations (GDPR, TKG 2003).
PRIVACY_POLICY.DATA_COLLECTION_TEXT: If you send me an email or use the contact form, your provided data will be stored for the purpose of processing your request and in case of follow-up questions. I will not share this data without your consent.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_TEXT: You have the right to information, correction, deletion, restriction, data portability, revocation and objection. If you believe that the processing of your data violates data protection law or your data protection rights have been violated in any other way, you can file a complaint with the supervisory authority.
